thread.title: Visit Florida launches second Annual 'Sunshine Contest'Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Visit Florida launches second Annual 'Sunshine Contest'Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Visit Florida launches second Annual 'Sunshine Contest'Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Visit Florida launches second annual ‘Sunshine Contest’
Owing to its enormous success last year, VISIT FLORIDA has announced the second annual ‘Sunshine Contest’ for Indian travel agents and tour operators. The tourism board is offering two winners a chance to be a part of the next VISIT FLORIDA FAM trip.
Taking place from 1 July to 30 August 2015, each participant must complete the application in entirety to qualify for the grand prize. The VISIT FLORIDA India team will judge each entry based on completion of the required criteria. The final announcement of the winners will be made the first week of September.
The criteria for entering the contest are as follows:
‘Like’ the VISIT FLORIDA India Facebook page Complete the VISIT FLORIDA Specialist program and the Orlando Training program within the contest period Draft a creative 10 day Florida itinerary using power point (Maximum 5 slides), clearly list:
Speaking on the occasion Ms. Seldon Tenzing, Account Director India, VISIT FLORIDA said, “ The objective of this contest is to encourage travel agents to get a deeper understanding of what Florida has to offer and also to experience the exquisite hospitality, attractions, cuisine, and mobility of this destination. We hope this contest will enlighten and enhance the knowledge of our trade partners selling this exotic destination.”
The prize will include an economy class roundtrip ticket from India, hotel accommodations, meals and a guided tour of the destination.
Source:- Visit Florida
